#labels Class
*Quick Reference:*

<wiki:toc />

=resourceRelationship=

*Quick Reference:* http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/ResourceRelationship

The category of information pertaining to relationships between resources (instances of data records, such as Occurrences, Taxa, Locations, Events).

Resources can be thought of as identifiable records and may include, but need not be limited to Occurrences, Locations, Events, Identifications, or Taxon records. For discussion see http://code.google.com/p/darwincore/wiki/ResourceRelationship
